qas.question: What change in conditions may make the Amazon rainforest unsustainable?

answers.text: severely reduced rainfall and increased temperatures
severely reduced rainfall and increased temperatures

qas.question: A complete loss of rainforest cover may be caused by what type of emissions?
If one computer model turns out correct, by what year would there be a nearly complete loss of rainforest in the Amazon basin?
How long may the Amazon rainforest be threatened, according to some computer models?
What are the main threats facing the Amazon rainforest in the current century?

answers.text: climate change in addition to deforestation
climate change in addition to deforestation
climate change in addition to deforestation

qas.question: Increased rainfall and decreased temperatures may make what unsustainable?
A decrease in greenhouse gases may lead to a complete loss of what?
Some computer models suggest the rain forest will become threatened after what?
Hunting and population are the main threats facing what?
Simulation of what is consistent across different models?

context: Một mô hình máy tính của biến đổi khí hậu trong tương lai gây ra bởi <a1_0><a1_1><a1_2> khí gây hiệu ứng nhà kính <a1_2/><a1_1/> khí thải <a1_0/> cho thấy rằng <b5_0><b8_0> rừng nhiệt đới Amazon <b8_0/><b5_0/> có thể trở nên không bền vững trong điều kiện <a0_1><a0_2> nghiêm khắc <a0_0> giảm lượng mưa và tăng nhiệt độ <a0_2/><a0_1/><a0_0/> , dẫn đến mất mát gần như hoàn toàn <b6_0> bìa rừng mưa nhiệt đới <b6_0/> trong lưu vực <a2_1> bởi <a2_0><a2_2> 2100 <a2_2/><a2_1/><a2_0/> .
